data.actual_result: You get a second user details pop-up
data.expected_result: You shouldn't get another user details pop-up
data.short_description: Second user details pop-up if you exit the app while trying to send someone a message using it
data.steps_to_repro: - Press hold on a user's avatar - Click send message - Exit the Discord by pressing the home button (do not exit the app entirely) - Reopen Discord and notice the you get a second user details pop-up
